excerpt: These tangy vegan lemon bars are a perfect balance of sweet and sour! A delicious vegan treat that is easy to make and a sure crowd pleaser.

instructions.name: Making the crust
instructions: Preheat the oven to 350Â°F and grease an 8x8 inch baking pan.
In a mixing bowl, combine flour, powdered sugar, and vegan butter. Mix until a crumbly dough is formed.
Press the dough into the baking pan and prick it with a fork. Bake for 20 minutes or until lightly golden. Let it cool down.

instructions.name: Making the filling
instructions: In a blender or food processor, combine tofu, granulated sugar, cornstarch, lemon zest, lemon juice, and turmeric powder. Mix until smooth.
Pour the mixture onto the cooled crust and smooth out the top with a spatula.
Bake for 30 minutes or until the filling is firm and golden.
Let the bars cool down completely before serving. You can dust them with some powdered sugar, cut them into squares, and enjoy!
